OrgName.entry: NORWOOD AND BISHOPSHOLME TENANTS AND RESIDENTS ASSOCIATION

Desc.entry: Provides social sessions for tenants of Norwood and Bishopsholme, including craft, IT, bingo, keep fit, painting and drawing, local history, quiz nights, social evenings, Halloween and Christmas parties for children and ladies crafts sessions. Also provides a meeting room for Council staff and Neighbourhood Watch.

category.entry: TENANTS AND RESIDENTS GROUPS - POSTAL DISTRICT 5
